AttackerCapabilities: Ability to spoof client IP address

SecurityMeasures: Using X-Forwarded-For header for client IP identification

Steps.Description: Identify the presence of a filter on client IP address.

StepDetails.Hypothesis: The server filters requests based on client IP address.
StepDetails.Action: Scan the 172.16.2.0/24 subnet with the X-Forwarded-For header set to 172.16.2.24.
StepDetails.Result: Obtain a 200 OK response code and see the login page.

Steps.Description: Exploit SQL injection vulnerability to gain access to the login page.

StepDetails.Hypothesis: Exploiting SQL injection will allow access to the login page.
StepDetails.Action: Submit a POST request to login.php with a payload containing a malicious email and password parameter.
